reviews.review_text: Very happy with my purchase! The wall shelves arrived well-packaged, with all the screws and parts included, and the material feels sturdy and high-quality. Installation was easy, and the modern design adds a nice decorative and functional touch to the room. I would definitely order again. Highly recommended!

the stencil for drilling holes in my wall was evidently for a larger set of shelves. The mounting brackets were 8 3/16"apart. The stencil was for a set with a 10" span between the brakets. I made the mistake of not checking first, so I had holes to patch and unreuseable hardware. The second set had no stencil at all.

reviews.title: Hardware is trash
reviews.review_text: The hardware was awful, so it was impossible for the shelves to hold anything without falling off. The reason I gave 2 stars instead of 1 is because I decided to purchase shelf brackets and used those instead. Otherwise, the shelves would have ended up in the trash. I had to spend a little more money, but they look nice and are very sturdy with this modification.

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.review_text: Vague instructions. Poor design makes it very difficult to get the shelves sturdy. I've never had an issue installing or assembling things around the house, and I wanted to throw these shelves in the trash. Installation was beyond frustrating. I got the shelves installed, but they do not sit perfectly flush with the wall, so anything cylindrical would roll forward off the shelf. I do not recommend this product whatsoever.

The packaging was really nice. Unfortunately, the shelves aren't. They won't stay up. Maybe that's because I had to hang them up a little differently because I didn't have a drill, but I'm not sure. I genuinely can't tell if it's my fault that they're so unstable or not. The nails are in the wall, but the shelves refuse to stay. Well, one shelf does, but that's probably because I never touch that one. The other shelf is very flimsy. You have to be VERY gentle with it or it will fall. Actually, the one shelf just fell a few minutes ago while I was laying in bed, NOT TOUCHING it. That's what inspired me to make this review. I'm going to try and see if maybe I can reinforce the shelf with a command strip or two... but as it is now, I can't recommend these shelves. One positive is, though, that the instruction manual was clear and conceive. As I said earlier, the packaging was also nice. I just wish the actual product was good, too.

Buying the item was the biggest hurrdle, let me explain why. i ordered online to get picked up the next day, next day comes around then got an email saying 1 of the 2 that i ordered was unavailable and that i could get the other shipped to my home for free. I was ok with that so i clicked the option to get it shipped and Walmart site tells me that my address is unavailable for delivery, hmmm that's interesting because I've had items shipped to my house before with no issues, so i contact my local walmart to pick up the 1 items that they did have and they tell me that they don't have anything ready for me so they give me a 1 800 number to call. I proceed to call the number which the person that answered was amazingly friendly and helpful. They were able to get the items shipped to me for free for next day delivery, well thats not the end of it. i did recieve the item next day, but only half the order, so i called the 1-800 number again, which i was greeted with the most polite person ever and they said my order got split into 2 deliveries for some reason and that i should get it later today, i was like ok, awesome that sounds good! it didn't get delivered until the next day :( , so something that took minutes to order ended up with me having to spend extra time to get things squared away and finally get my item. Yeah i know first world problems go cry me a river bla bla bla. but listen if a store offered these options then people expect their items that was promised at a certain time and no i couldn't just go to the store i get them myself cause it was unavailable at the store and was only available through online only at this time because they had run out of stock on the floor.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: So many things wrong with these. First of all, the insert with the hole measurements is completely off and i had to measure it from the shelf to drill ANOTHER hole. Also, the metal anchors were on too tight on the shelf and the nail that it came with would not insert in. Lastly, the dry wall anchors don't completely hold the nail in place because it has to be sticking out a bit in order to slide the shelf on so the whole thing is tilted. DO NOT BUY THIS.

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.review_text: If I could give it no stars, I would. This was such a huge waste of money. It didn't stay flush to the wall and any minor tap of the shelf or the wall would have it tumbling down. Yes, we attached it to studs and it still fell down. Don't waste your time and money on this garbage.

reviews.title: Slides, Not Shelves
reviews.review_text: This product is mislabeled. They're clearly fun slides for one's knick-knacks and bric-a-brac. As mentioned in SEVERAL reviews, these do not sit level/ flush with walls without purchasing brackets separately to support them. My husband is a framer and couldn't get them to rest how they're supposed to rest. Very poor design.

Instructions are terrible. I used the 3/16th as instructed and the plastic hangers will not go in, they just break before they'd go in. After getting screws in the item doesn't hang properly. Just hangs off slightly. Have holes in my walls for nothing. Product is junk, going to buy the ones I bought last time on Amazon that worked without issue.

reviews.title: Works even without drilling
reviews.review_text: Bought this as a blind bet because I cannot drill the walls of the apartment I rent. However, I tried to use command to attach the shelves to the bathroom wall and it worked perfectly. If you face the same issue, I guarantee it's safe. If not, they send screws together for you to assemble them the classic way hahaha

reviews.title: DO NOT buy!
reviews.review_text: Over the years I have fixed, installed %26!put together a lot of various things around the house until I came across these junk shelves. I have wasted the better part of 2 hours of my day off trying to hang these things %26 they are never flush %26 one side even ripped a hole into my wall. I'm sure you can guess where they were made… Do not buy. Returning these tomorrow.

reviews.title: I wish they worked for me.
reviews.review_text: I got these shelves for my son to hold a couple small lightweight figures. First, the installation... Harder than it should have been. The back of one doesn't like up exactly right which made it difficult. Then the piece you put the screw in, then into your wall seems huge compared to others i hsve used. So now I have a couple good sized holes in my wall. All that aside, really not a big deal as long as they work. Its a good deal for 2 shelves. Well, then i got them on the wall...barely. They kept wanting to lean forward. Yes I installed them correctly. Finally I got it figured out and they were leveled snd sturdy ....so I thought. He stuck one figure on it, small lightweight, palm size character and the shelf fell off. I thought it was me and had someone else check it. No, its rhe design of the shelf. 2 small screws holding up a shelf that weight it should have more support. I'm returning these and found some with better support. Sad because i did like the look of them too.

First thing, The instructions are poor! Difficult to read; print very small! I had to use a magnifying glass to read. Also, poor quality AND just difficult to install on wall. Just disappointed. I finally got them on the wall BUT I did my way of installing! Don't buy! thanks, GAB.

reviews.title: Shelves
reviews.review_text: Love the shelves they are very challenging to put up on the wall. Even though I ordered 5 packs of 2 and received 3 packs out of 5 that was very disappointing I would recommend buying in store and not order online literally have to wait 10 business days for my refund which is unacceptable to deal with when it was the delivery's mistake not mines! Overall they are very nice

Loved everything about these floating shelves!! Easy assembly, very well made and most important is the price is great!!!! I'm putting these shelves above my stove and going to put my Alexa and some plants on them!! Extremely satisfied!!
This is definitely a waste of time, money and patience. The concept of floating shelves was good except that the makers had no idea how to make it to work.

reviews.title: Inexpensive shelves
reviews.review_text: You have to have a small or very lite item(s) to place on this shelf. The wall anchors and the metal connectors were a struggle to connect therefore loosening to anchor hold in the wall.

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.review_text: Wouldn't hold up even with the anchors and instructions. Put a small box of tissues on there and it bent the shelf downward and slipped right off. Don't buy.
The product as marketed is not stable, and requires 2 small L shaped brackto hold it level, even when put into stud, the shelve plants without additional support
Stencil print is definitely off. The back of the board that holds the screw is so flimsy. A piece of junk. Never mainstays for wall shelves again. Don't waste your money on something that won't last.

reviews.title: Don't recommend
reviews.review_text: When I opened this I realized that it only had 3 screws in it and i need 4. i used one of my own that worked. Once i got everything screwed in the shelves itself were not easy to put onto the shelves. Just overall a bad product.

reviews.title: Junk junk junk
reviews.review_text: These are junk. So difficult to install. Flimsy screw slots to hold the shelf- any little pressure and they bend open so that the slef can fall off the wall. What a waste of money!!! Never again with mainstays shelves!!!

reviews.title: Looks great super easy install of only 10-15 mins
reviews.review_text: I ended up putting these shelves directly next to each other and there is a gap in the middle because they weren't cut perfectly straight but you can barely see or notice it. I had this up in 15 minutes. It was so easy and it came out really perfect you do need some tools like a leveler, a hammer screwdriver, and the correct size bits for the screwdriver. It came out so good. I'm happy. I put them next to each other instead of leaving a space in the middle. I'm a 24 year old woman and I had no issues installing this. It's not rocket science but make sure you have practice with drills and leveling. Take your time don't rush it.

Looked great. Relatively easy to install – one was easier to get front-to-back level than the other, but it could equally have been an issue with the screws used or placement as much as it might have been screw mounts that were slightly off. Whichever it was, it still ended up looking exactly as I wanted it to, and was definitely great for the price.

reviews.title: Stylish, Sturdy, and Saved Me from Desktop Chaos
reviews.review_text: These floating shelves are a great find—solid quality, lots of color options, and a really good value for the price. I originally got a set to use next to my desk in my home office as a creative workaround for holding my desktop tower and phone charger/stand. It was a smart (and way cheaper) alternative to the fancy desk stands I kept seeing online. Didn't want my desktop on the floor, didn't want it hogging space on the desk—these shelves solved the problem perfectly. One small hiccup: one of the shelves arrived without the mounting brackets installed. Not a huge deal since I had extra screws on hand, but if I didn't, it would've meant a return or an annoying trip to the hardware store. So heads-up—maybe check your parts before diving into install mode. Despite that, I liked them so much that I bought a second set to use in another spot around the house. They look great, feel sturdy, and definitely upgraded my space without breaking the bank.

reviews.title: Great product for the price !
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased a wooden shelf from Walmart, and I'm extremely satisfied with my purchase. The shelf is both sturdy and aesthetically pleasing, making it a great addition to my home. It was easy to assemble, and the quality exceeded my expectations for the price. Highly recommended

reviews.title: Will fall off!!!
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love these! They looked so good mounted, and 30 Mins later everything fell off and broke. I am positive I secured them right but the way they are made is horribly Designed. Expect them to fall. I tried a few times in different places, diff screws. Same result, don't do it.

reviews.title: Looks nice (for mdf) but not easy or safe
reviews.review_text: Mounting hardware is difficult to level and not sturdy enough. The head of the screw is not big enough to slid in the bracket snuggly. In order to get the brackets onto the screw, the screws have to stick out of the wall pretty far which causes the shelf to tilt forward. These are only good for show-- don't use for anything more than feather-light decor. I will have to use L brackets to mount them safely.

reviews.title: Poor design, tilt forward, not level
reviews.review_text: My husband got so frustrated trying to hang these shelves and he is a handy guy! Read other ppl's reviews about how they tilt forward. We are going to go buy small L brackets to get these installed correctly on the wall.
No matter what was put on top of it. Shelf wouldn't stay on wall. I tried several different screws, nails and finally had to use big brackets to hold it up

reviews.title: Faulty Design
reviews.review_text: Do not buy these shelves. I had three carpenters attempt to hang them and all decided that the shelves are designed faulty and will not be level or hold.

reviews.title: Very nice and fits any decor
reviews.review_text: The Mainstays 16.5 WallMounted Floating Shelf is very nice. It is made of a very thick, sturdy imitation wood. Very well made. Easily mountable. Has 4 metal inserts with plastic pieces to screw into wall and hold in place. Very good workmanship.

reviews.title: Poor mounting design
reviews.review_text: Poor design of the wall mounts. The shelves are not level when I finally got them in place. I had to shim them to get close to level, and then put putty on the backs of plastic picture frames to secure them because I don't trust them to support anything with weight. The color is nice and the price was cheap, but overall, I will not purchase any more of these like I had planned. You get what you pay for...

reviews.title: Attractive.
reviews.review_text: These Mainstays Floating Shelves are really attractive. I needed something in my bedroom not only for looks but for convenience to put my most used items on for easy access. I love the light natural finish which goes perfectly in my bedroom. I really love how these 2 shelves look so I'll probably get a few more sets to add to these. They were very easy to put up and came with the needed hardware for mounting, which includes 4 screws and 4 anchors. Each shelf measures 16.5 x 5.5 x 1.5 inches and holds up to 5 lbs.

reviews.title: Not good...
reviews.review_text: Getting these things installed is a huge pain. They also chose to use curved neck screws instead of flat, which causes the shelves to lean downward even when installed properly. It's a very poor design and the price is very high for a bad product. Overall quality control on these is horrible as well.

reviews.title: Hollow, lightweight shelves
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for sturdy, good quality floating shelves, then pass on these. They are mostly made of MDF and are hollow. This is why they are so light weight. They come with mounting brackets already installed and the screws and anchors are in a bag. The weight limit these shelves can hold is 5 pounds. If you are going to install these, I do suggest using metal wall anchors that spread out in the back instead of the plastic ones these shelves come with. The brackets, from the center of each hole, only measures 8.5" apart so placing them both in studs is impossible unless you have studs that are 8.5" apart. I would also opt for a different screw instead of the ones that it comes with. In all, these shelves are nice looking but not sturdy enough.

I had looked on Amazon and other sites couldnt find this color.it was going on a black wall. Looks great. Only Walmart had them. I didn't like paying shipping BUT I really wanted these shelves. So less than 20.00 I got what a really wanted and liked.

reviews.title: Don't buy.
reviews.review_text: I finally had to give in an buy actually shelf brackets. No matter what we did, one shelf will only stay on the wall, cattywhompus, with nothing on it. Put anything over 1/4 pound on it and it falls off. I might add that my son in law is a contractor, and he's the one that put them up, lol. I think he's qualified! Will not recommend, will not buy again.

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.review_text: One shelf was chipped out of the box. They do not hang straight. Shelves tip downwards. Cheap junk. I did not end up even using.

reviews.title: Looks Nice
reviews.review_text: So far in package the item looks very nice. Have not installed yet, so we shall see if this is a good item or not.

reviews.title: almost but not quite
reviews.review_text: extremely top heavy if you don't have them exactly on the studs then they're going to rip your drywall down I ended up having to get a and L bracket
It did not come with the right supplies to securely place in drywall. I had to go buy different other supplies. Will see how long this will hold up.
Nice finish, good size for small area, and easy installation. Perfect for a little extra flat space in the bathroom.
Appearance is fine. Price is great, but the mounting brackets on the back are poor and will not get a great fit

reviews.title: Poor design
reviews.review_text: Didn't come with a second set of screws for the second shelf, measuring paper didn't match the actual measurements of the shelf .
The assembly was really complicated After the drilling the shelves did not fit perfectly They were in a slanting position so things kept falling
Item cannot be mounted level because of hardware that comes with it. Unable to use without items sliding off.

reviews.title: Hard installation with no guidance
reviews.review_text: I couldn't get the screws to stay even with their provided materials so I had to order brackets to help them stay up. They look nice though and can hold some weight with the extra brackets

reviews.title: Do not buy unless you want to patch your drywall
reviews.review_text: Looked saggy on the wall, tried tightening the screws but then they weren't long enough to slip into the mount. They look terrible. Now I'll be patching holes in my drywall
DO NOT BUY AT ALL WAY TO CHEAP , YOU CAN NOT PUT ANYTHING HEAVY ON THEM AT ALL , WAS GOING TO PUT 2 MORE BRACKET UNDER THEM BUT WILL BUY THE OTHER ONES I HAVE NOW

reviews.title: Good enough for the price
reviews.review_text: Easy to install Covered ours to match the wood color in the room Price was good enough knowing we were going to cover them anyways They are sturdy and seem to be goid quality
Needed to put photographs of kids and this is do just that. Ridiculously inexpensive and I can used to same day delivery. Someone is losing money but it's not my problem. Buy it!

reviews.title: GRRR…
reviews.review_text: Never received. I guess leaving bad reviews is the next form of complaining about not receiving products I've ordered. I'm missing at least one item every single time. Will be calling ‘representative'
Great shelves. They look nice up on the walls. Love the color of them! Only downfall is screws in the drywall. Mollys were to fat to get into the wall.

reviews.title: Difficult to Hang
reviews.review_text: These are a great value, but are difficult to hand. The mounting screws on one of them were crooked and the anchors are prettyu cheap mayerial. If you can get them hung up, they look great.

reviews.title: Cute but not quality
reviews.review_text: Bought these shelves for nursery storage and while they get the job done and have the clean aesthetic I was aiming for they did come slightly curved/warped which makes them not look straight when hung.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Made poorly, parts on back that hang onto the screw are crooked and made wrong. Impossible for us to hang up without it tilting downward or not hanging at all. Bummed.
two nice size shelves to artiscally display plants or pictures in a bathroom or bedroom at a very reasonable price
Not bad for the price. There's only two anchor points and it's the back of a screw which was a little weird. Makes it harder to keep it level when assembling but for the price it's great

reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
reviews.review_text: The shelf is hazardous to have on the wall as it easily falls off. A huge NO if you have kids. And there's a ticket indicating possible exposure to formaldehyde which can lead to cancer as said in California. Get a different shelf.

reviews.title: waste of money
reviews.review_text: Garbage. the screws provided do not hold to the wall and if you use the stabilizers, it does not fit the cutout to align with the wood. threw in the garbage.

reviews.title: Ok-ish
reviews.review_text: Shelves are hallow and too unstable to really hold anything. Instead of wall anchor screws hinges would work a lot better. Only suitable to hold very lightweight objects.

The shelves came with scratch marks. Also, they do not hang flush to wall. You will want to use your own screw anchors if you are putting into drywall as the anchors enclosed did not hold the screws in the wall.

reviews.title: Display shelves
reviews.review_text: These shelves are nice, however, the hardwate provided and the weight if the shelves made them difficult to unstall as well as staying in the wall even when put directly to a stud. I wpuld not recommend they be used for anything with weight.

reviews.title: Very thick and sturdy
reviews.review_text: Very good quality compared to other shelves ive bought. they're very thick and nice quality. i was very surprised at how good they were. I bought two sets and plan to buy more.

reviews.title: do not buy
reviews.review_text: do not buy!!!! some reviews aren't even for the same shelves. the shelves will sag forward and eventually fall out the wall. The anchors and screws are trash, the bracket terribly uneven.

would not recommend buying these shelves they were made horrible they did not line up straight. The value seem great, but learn the hard way value isn't always the best way it's the quality and this product is far from it

I liked the design and quality of the shelf, but unfortunately it arrived damaged (buckled and with stains). I hope the seller improves packaging. Despite this, I consider it a good option for its price.

reviews.title: Bad design
reviews.review_text: Very weird design in that it is very hard to mount the shelf on the wall in a satisfactory way. No matter what we did, it sagged forward. Eventually, I just used two brackets to brace it properly

reviews.title: One came with a big defect
reviews.review_text: One of mine came damaged fresh out of the package. Not sure how it could have been missed with quality control but one shelf came with a major defect. Got them on sale so maybe that's why.

reviews.title: Nice Look, Nonsense Installation
reviews.review_text: Should have returned these but liked the natural look/color of the "wood" and I was tired of looking for units. Went for these bc of the price but they proved to be more trouble than they were worth. So confident in this pursuit, that by the time I gave up, I had already thrown away the box. To install, you have to basically hook the metal clip on the back of the shelf to the screws on your walls. It doesn't flesh against the wall but slightly flops down so not only does it not look good but your items aren't secure. Ended up purchasing additional wall brackets so price ended up being around the same amount as the other shelf sets I was trying to avoid. The shelves aren't wood, which I already knew so not made about that. The material they are coated in, however, does stain fairly easily so an fyi (mine is in my bathroom so left dark rings from what cream or oil got on it). Now that they are installed, they do look quite nice but if I could do it all again, I'd save myself the frustration.

reviews.title: Didn't work
reviews.review_text: Follow instructions but still couldn't get shelf to stay straight up and hooked in.
Back of shelves brackets are not straight so it wouldn't mount correctly on the wall

reviews.title: Bangs up and scratched
reviews.review_text: Edges were messed up and unfinished looking.
do not buy this. instructions arent good. its not sturdy

reviews.title: All around great
reviews.review_text: They came well packaged and in good condition. Ordered this size to give as a present.

reviews.title: Great value
reviews.review_text: Perfect product for home decor. Solid wood and easy to set up.

reviews.title: It's perfect
reviews.review_text: Really easy to install and very sturdy

reviews.title: Great for bedrooms
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my daughter's perfume collection. Wouldn't put anything too heavy on them.
I have not received it yet so its difficult to rate it. I know the shipping cost was to high.
fits my need, %26 easily installed...looks good as well.
The screws/anchors are weak and don't hold the shelf flush against the wall.

reviews.title: Strong and beautiful shelves
reviews.review_text: I am still in the process of decorating my new house and being an interior designer, I have floating shelves in most of my rooms where I place flowers, pictures and diffusers. These shelves are so easy to mount because it comes with the mounting hardware. They stay strong to the wall, and does not make my objects fall when I place items on them. They are so beautiful and bring beauty to my home.

reviews.title: Not sturdy
reviews.review_text: The concept of the floating shelves is great but they are very difficult to install. We tried using the drywall inserts for the screws but we couldn't slide the shelf on the screw without the screw moving. We found a stud for the screws but because the brackets are not 16 inches apart we could only put it in one stud. We had to back the screws out in order for them to fit the bracket but then the shelf would not sit flush to the wall. They are not sturdy or tight to the wall. Because of this, I'm afraid to put anything heavier than a few ounces in it.

reviews.title: not worth it
reviews.review_text: I really wish it came with the screws it needed, i've tried 3 different screws and NONE work, i really just gave up on trying to put these things up

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.review_text: These are a nightmare to try to hang. And when you FINALLY get it, they sag. Not snug to the wall at all.

reviews.title: not well made
reviews.review_text: the hardware that came with these shelves just broke off in our wall when we hung the shelf on the screws. not worth it.
I knew what I ordered with price and the quality is just as expected and am satisfied with the overall order.

reviews.title: Awful quality!
reviews.review_text: These shelves are very poor quality. The edges were not painted, the shelves were warped and they smell bad!
Screws striped the wall and left giant holes and shelves randomly fell down and broke the items it was holding!
the product matched my flooring and I am very satisfied with the price and quality of the product....
After reading instructions, boxed it all back up. No template for measuring the anchor and screws .

reviews.title: Unfortunately didn't work right
reviews.review_text: Shelves are pretty but difficult to install and don't sit flush to the wall
It is some very nice pieces although it doesn't hang well as it tilts forward

reviews.title: PLEASE THIS PRODUCT COME NOT STRAIGHT. FIND BETTER
reviews.review_text: Took forever to put upon the wall and even needed different parts.
Screws are very lose and don't actually hold up shelves
im blown away by how great these are given the super low price. The shelves are smooth sleek
It's a good product, it had a very good price and it wasn't exactly what I wanted but it works for me
Anchors that came with shelf are flimsy, bent rather than actually going through drywall. Screw holes not level
Leans when placed on wall. Hinges would be better than the current hardware. Everything falls off when I shut my bedroom door.
Nice little shelves, can be a pain to get the screws to catch on the hardware, even more difficult if you have textured or uneven walls
Nice looking but the worst hidden bracket system ever. Had to buy separate shelf brackets just to secure it to the wall

reviews.title: Great deal
reviews.review_text: I really like these shelves. I put them above my bed for a light lamp %26 some other decor. They look really nice.

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.review_text: The product does not stay flat, it tilts towards the ground so anything you put on the shelves would just fall off

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: Easy to hang up. When hung right they seem decently sturdy, and there's no gap between the wall and shelf. Exactly what I wanted.
Installation was a bit tricky but once you understand how to hang them, it's like riding a bike. Perfect thickness
Thought this would be a great purchase to display legos in my bedroom, but it wouldn't hold any weight. Not a bad price but just don't work for me.
Wasn't what I expected I'm not sure I'm gonna keep it yet. Had to admit not real wood. It is Prestwood and I do not like Prestwood.

reviews.title: good purchase!
reviews.review_text: very nice shelves, even if not real wood. I love how the mounting bracket does not show at all once installed.
Was a bit hard to get into my wall but once it was in it was perfect. It's a little wobbly so it's not good for holding heavy objects
The shelf is cute. The attachment does not go on straight in order for the shelf to look right. Needs a different mount! Do not recommend!

overall nice floating shelves. only complaint is one shelf has some residue on both sides which I had to scrub off. It was visible to the naked eye. I'm wondering why they would even deliver that to me. It's a open sectioned box.

reviews.title: meh
reviews.review_text: shelves were difficult to align, and the spacing of the screws isnt wide enough to install into 2 studs, which was needed because the wall anchors didnt cut it.

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.review_text: I’m on the fence bc we like the design but it’s so cheaply made and it was not cheap for what it’s made from! It wasn’t simple to hang up either. It came down and stripped the back which is why I don’t recommend it.
Was defective and could not hang on the wall due to the hangers on the back of the shelving.

reviews.title: Save your money
reviews.review_text: Horrible - do not stay on wall, hold anything.
Orders arrive on the day they suppose to, good products and good employees.

reviews.title: Easy installation
reviews.review_text: Easy to install, and just as expected! Super cute in my bathroom.
Perfect size, color and length for what I needed, great price and fast shipping

reviews.title: Decent shelf for the money
reviews.review_text: Went up easy with provided hardware looks great and for the price great deal

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: Good wall shelf. Easy to install.Affordable price
the back is just screws holding it up its a slide on so bumps from underneath will knock shelf down
one of the packs were missing the screws so i was only able to put one set up.

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.review_text: Do not buy this. The hardware doesn't work with the product and it can't hold any weight
i love how easy it is to put up and how amazing it looks

reviews.title: Nice Shelves
reviews.review_text: Good quality easy to install I sanded lightly and painted to match my kitchen
Would not hang flush against the wall. Design flaw. Don't waste your time or money

reviews.title: Decorating
reviews.review_text: Nice small shelve for my home. I put a plant on it and other small stuff. Looks good in white.

reviews.title: Okay for decorations
reviews.review_text: Floating shelves always look really cool in my opinion. This two-piece set from Mainstays is pretty average. Each shelf measures 16.5 inches long and sticks out from the wall about 5.5 inches. They are a nice size for small decorative items, but those items will have to be fairly lightweight. Because of how far apart the screw holes need to be, I could only put one screw from each shelf into a stud. For the other, I had to use the provided drywall screw insert. The shelves really weren't that complicated to mount on the wall. The color is a neutral toned natural wood. Overall, I think these shelves are okay for what they are, but I wouldn't get another set. I would rather have shelves that can hold more weight (they specify they can each hold 5 pounds) and feel more durable. These specific shelves are very lightweight.

reviews.title: Hanging up is almost impossible. Damage to produc
reviews.review_text: I thought this was cute a modern floating shelf I could put over my sink and at a good price. It was only half the size I needed (needed 32” one shelf, not 16” two shelf’s) and it would have been nice to have another size option with the same approximate price. Unfortunately I did not look at the attachments before I ordered the shelves and would absolutely not have ordered them had I knows what kind of hanging device it had on the back of the shelf. Anytime I have EVER tried to hang something remotely evenly using this type of bracket it as been nothing but a complete nightmare. So I bought XL cCommand Velco strips meant to hold 16 lbs each, I put THREE on the back of each 16” shelf (think each shelf weights 2.5 lbs) and I don’t think these are going to work either. A shelf that CANNOT bel held up is a POINTLESS shelf!! Also, a whole side of my shelf and a front corner is damaged on my shelf. It’s not easy where I live to just return things to Walmart so most likely unless I somehow am near a Walmart I guess these will be stuffed in a corner, they aren’t usable without a REAL known to work hanging system. Not pleased.

reviews.title: wall mount shelves.
reviews.review_text: I love the natural look color. what i disliked was the mounting of the shelves. I had just painted my walls. Wanted to mount these shelves, had a hard time scratched up my walls pretty bad. Trying to match the srews to the back bracket of the shelf difficult. I had to mount the shelves to the planks and then screwed the planks to the wall.

reviews.title: Floating Shelves
reviews.review_text: These shelves are solid and heavy. Appealing black finish.
They where pretty strong they held my glassware so good
unable to secure to the wall. have to find different screws/anchors

reviews.title: Jesus the Carpenter… Blessed these
reviews.review_text: Perfect addition. To my multi-cross-platform , stitched and routed hubs and gateways work of ArT

reviews.title: disapointed
reviews.review_text: it doesn't stays very straight on the wall, it stays bended. should have have a better anchor.

reviews.title: Wouldn't stay up

Due to my experience, I'm purchasing another set in a different color!
These shelves are perfect for displaying pictures and decor.

reviews.title: short and heavy
reviews.review_text: short length, looked longer online. nice finish but heavy.
the only issue I have putting this up was the anchors aren't very good get better anchors
I received the wrong order I'll never order online again from Walmart and I was charged a extra $6
you cant toghten the shelves to be straight once theyre up. they always tilt forward

reviews.title: This is my second set.
reviews.review_text: This is the second set I purchased. I needed them for my satellite speakers.

reviews.title: Hard to put up
reviews.review_text: Very difficult to put up. The shelves are too heave for this type of hanging method.

reviews.title: Quality shelf
reviews.review_text: The floating shelf is very easy to hang, sturdy and attractive.

reviews.title: baf quality
reviews.review_text: these do not hang evenly and they are not good quality

reviews.title: Didn't hold up
reviews.review_text: Had to buy extra brackets for it to stay up on my wall. Just screws and anchors weren't enough.

reviews.title: Hard to install if you don't know how.
reviews.review_text: My walls are not so thick, we needed other tools to install to secure it. But It looks good

reviews.title: Certified trash
reviews.review_text: I want my money back theses shelves will never be flush

reviews.title: hanging up
reviews.review_text: im just having difficulty getting them to hang on wall properly

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.review_text: Since they only have a small screw head to hold on to it would hold anything and would fall with the slightest touch. I am definitely returning them!

reviews.title: Nice shelving
reviews.review_text: I love these shelves. They were easy to install just make sure you have a level and measuring tape. Very chunky but light.
I liked how light the shelve feels like, however it was a bit shorter than I was expecting and the wood grain was also a little bit different from what I was expecting.

reviews.title: Good shelves with new anchors
reviews.review_text: First things first I did NOT enjoy putting these up however the end result is they are beautiful and strong! As I said with the mainstays corner shelves I bought to go with this, do NOT use the wall anchors they provide, they will want to fall out. Also this is a shelf that sort of hangs on the wall which I was not a fan of. I'm used to the ones that have the bracket that you screw to the wall and you slide and tighten the shelves on. Overall though they're strong with the new anchors and it's a nice looking shelf. I have 4 in total.

reviews.title: Great small spaces, looks AWESOME, hardware-SO SO
reviews.review_text: These smaller (16.5") wall floating shelves are aesthetically and visually appealing. The light tan color is very neutral for all decor. The shelves have a very smooth finish and are lightweight and it comes with the required hardware to hang. I didn't care for the hardware to hang the shelf - part of the hardware is already installed into the shelf, they supply screws and you simply slide the shelf on the screw (I didn't really care for this technique).

reviews.title: Attractive shelves
reviews.review_text: These shelves have a nice, light, natural color to them. They’re about 16” x 5” x 1.5”. The laminate finish has a nice print and texture. These can only be used for lightweight decorative items, as 5 lbs is the maximum weight limit. They include mounting hardware: anchors and screws. The mount on the back of the shelf is a horizontal key that the shelf shelf slides sideways onto the screw head.

reviews.title: Very nice shelves
reviews.review_text: I absolutely these Mainstays 16.5" Wall Mounted Floating Shelves. I got them in the pretty tan color. I love how they come in a two pack too. They are made really well and a good quality. I put them up on my bedroom wall and they look really nice. I highly recommend!

reviews.title: Looks nice and modern
reviews.review_text: I really like the way this looks. They are very neutral. The size is perfect for a smaller nook in your home. They were easy to install and no hardware shows. The "wood" is obviously laminate and it is easy to tell this. They still look nice, but don't expect a realistic grain.

reviews.title: Great Shelves!
reviews.review_text: These shelves are the perfect size for just about anything. I am currently using one of them to jazz up my office a little and decorate for Halloween. Haven't decided if I want to put the second one underneath it or somewhere else! They are sturdy, well made and easy to hang.

reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
reviews.review_text: These shelves are so cool. They are really simple to hang and you can do so many creative things with them. I have them in just about every room in our house. I have plants on them in the living room, toy models in my kids room, candles in the bathroom, spices in the kitchen, posters in our movie theater themed basement and probably more I can’t think of. They are super easy to install. All the hardware you need for mounting them and instructions are included. Each shelf holds up to 5 pounds and measures 16 1/2“ x 5 1/2“ x 1 and a half inches high. The color I have just gotten is called light natural. It’s more brown than gray, but definitely has some gray undertones to it. I don’t think that these are a new concept, but I think they are well executed, and really easy to hang up. I am rarely disappointed in the Mainstays product line. This item is no different. Great quality for a great price. I will definitely be going back for more.

reviews.title: Great for added style and storage
reviews.review_text: These shelves look really nice and are easy to mount (if you follow the instructions better than I did) they hold a good amount of items and are sturdy. My only complaint is that while trying to mount the back was scraped by the mounting screw and ripped, but luckily this is not seen. Note* I didn’t need to use teo for this area, but this is a two piece set.

reviews.title: buy yourself big mac instead
reviews.review_text: buy yourself a big mac meal before wasting money on this garbage. to start off, the lining paper given does not match with the holes on the shelf. to make matters worse, the nails did not even fit in the shelf holes. once we made the CORRECT holes in the wall BEFORE knowing this, the shelf was perfectly parallel to the wall, with a significant slant forward. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.

reviews.title: Don't buy
reviews.review_text: Wish I would have read the online reviews first but unfortunately I bought these in person. Like many others have already said, the hardware on these shelves are awful. They don't hang flush with the wall, there's no way you could put anything on them without it falling off. The shelves themselves are pretty, but they're not functional at all.

reviews.title: Elegant, simple and well made.
reviews.review_text: These floating shelves are an asset to any room. The kit includes two wooden shelves and the hardware required to install the shelves. Installation is easy and simple. The shelves are clean and elegant. I like these shelves because if it’s floating appearance, there is no messy stand to install. I do recommend to use these shelves for light display and not something heavy like books. I am thoroughly enjoying these shelves and I recommend this product.

reviews.title: Good quality shelves
reviews.review_text: We painted ours black and we loved the outcome.
It sucks it’s so hard to put in the walls and it sags down when you hang it

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.review_text: The mounting brackets on the back are uneven, so it's nearly impossible to get it hung level to begin with. If you manage to get it hung level, the drywall anchors that come with it are horrible and pull right out of the wall. If you are able to get it on two studs, it will still sag forward due to poor design. Might as well save your time, money and sanity. This has been the second set of these floating shelves I have tried to install, and both sets are equally miserable to try and put up.
It is a good quality poduct, was easy to install and arrived well packaged on time

reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.review_text: I love these shelves, easy to install, sturdy, and they look great! Im definitely going to order again!

reviews.title: Floating shelves
reviews.review_text: Mainstays Wall Mounted Floating Shelves were simple to mount. I like natural wood look of these tan shelves. They are the perfect size for my living room to display my pictures and figurine decorations.

reviews.title: great shelves
reviews.review_text: loved them! great price and no problems. some other reviews mentioned they had trouble with installation or them sitting flush but that must have been user error. ours were great!

reviews.title: Decorative
reviews.review_text: I can't wait to place these on my walls. These shelves are sturdy, thick and well crafted. Comes with screws and screw protectors to place in the wall. You will need to have a screwdriver on hand and know where you want to place it.

reviews.title: Nice!!
reviews.review_text: Was really surprised when we got them hung and decorated and how great they looked. It looks just like I imagined. I am so happy that I will have to order more, the price is very reasonable for these shelves.

reviews.title: Sleek and strong!
reviews.review_text: These floating shelves come with all the hardware needed to hang them. They are basic, yet very sleek and modern. They each hold up to 5 pounds, so that is plenty of room for decor. I can’t wait to get them hung!

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: The price is fantastic. The shelves were easy to install. I didnt need anchors screws went fine in the dry wall. They are perfect for childrens books and a few decorations. Wont hold heavy stuff unless you anchor them.

reviews.title: Nice shelving
reviews.review_text: Nice for the price but didn’t work for what I needed so i Started the return on line and it’s been about a month now and the return is still processing at this point I don’t care anymore.

reviews.title: Easy install
reviews.review_text: If you’re Looking to add floating shelves for decor these shelves are perfect. I love the light natural finish color. It’s very easy to install with only 5 steps and a few tools needed. These shelves bring in a classic look to any space.

reviews.title: Nice product
reviews.review_text: Good product . Looks cute. I’m unable to put it up very tightly though. It is a little lose on the wall though. I’m unable to sturdily fix it. But I just have a plant and couple candles on each so it stays put

reviews.title: Easy install
reviews.review_text: Easy to install and comes with the hardware to put them up. You will need a screwdriver though. These are small floating shelves that can hold up to 5lbs. I'm using mine for my Scentsy stuffed animals.

reviews.title: Easy to put up
reviews.review_text: Very nice decorative floating shelves that fit perfectly next to my mirror. Holds up to 5lbs, still need to figure out want I want there. Very easy to put up. A light natural finish to match my walls.

reviews.title: Easy to install but not very sturdy
reviews.review_text: I purchased these shelves to use in my bathroom. Beautiful shelves for a great price. Installation was simple and easy. However, we will use these elsewhere as they are not very sturdy. They’re good shelves for small decorations/items.

reviews.title: Do not buy!
reviews.review_text: They are terrible. Hung it up exactly as described but they still leaned forward so now I'm left with no shelf and 2 huge holes in my wall. Definitely cheap but you get what you pay for.

reviews.title: Floating shelves
reviews.review_text: These two wall floating shelves are perfect for displaying special photos or keepsakes. The wood grain is light in color, attractive and will match any decor. They install with screws only so do not put anything heavy on them.

reviews.title: Love these!
reviews.review_text: Love floating shelves and these from Mainstays are really nice! You receive two in your package and they are a nice light tan color with a wood looking finish. They were easy to install and hold a few knickknacks nicely.

reviews.title: Avoid at all costs
reviews.review_text: The shelves are basic white floating shelves. No gripes there. The design of the hanging system is absolute garbage. The screws are too small for the anchors. The template was inaccurate. Do NOT buy these!

reviews.title: DO. NOT. BUY
reviews.review_text: I bought two, I was very excited for these but as I started putting them up, the brackets ripped right out of the wall, with just the shelves weight. I have 1 inch thick drywall in my home. Half of the screw mounts broke, they left 8 dime size holes in my wall as they ripped. The screws don't fit in the mounts and the shelves are very heavy. The anchor points are all crooked, In order to make these work I'm going to have to find a replacement bracket for all 4 of my shelves. Please save yourself the time, energy, and money. Pay the extra 10$ per box for a good quality floating shelf, because these aren't it. After the mounts ripped out, I tried with just the screws and ultimately it still didn't work. Very poorly designed, and poorly made. Will be returning if possible.

reviews.title: Don't use the washers it comes with!
reviews.review_text: The quality of the shelves for the price is good. I had to finesse it a bit and put some cardboard from the box and fold it in half and put it behind the shelf to get it to be flush with the wall and not sag downward. Using the very large washers it comes with makes too big of a hole in the wall and makes the sagging worse. Get smaller washers and the holes won't be as loose. Very easy to hang and very straightforward with a few measurements. Good for what I needed them for. Just use some cardboard behind it so it doesn't sag against the wall downward and make your stuff slip. Also don't put heavy things on the shelf. Duh. They're tiny lol

reviews.title: Looks good & holds up nicely
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love these shelves! Easy to install and they look good in my room. They're durable and can hold quite a bit. I was able to clear some drawers/baskets out and show off some things I've had put away due to no space.

reviews.title: Sturdy and durable with lots of space for displaying your favorite things for showing off
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The shelves are thick and feel durable. I haven't mounted them yet but they are a nice size to show off a few knickknacks or books. Natural wood color looks really nice. Overall really happy with the product and am planning on buying a few more to put my collections on

reviews.title: Simple shelves on a budget
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great little shelves for a small area like a bathroom where I hung mine. These attach to the wall by drilling screws into the wall and sliding the shelves onto the screw so that it “catches” onto the screw in a metal bracket, sort of like hanging a picture frame. I wouldn't trust putting more than 5 pounds on these shelves because of how flimsy the attachment to the wall is, but if you have something small and lightweight, they're great to add a bit of decoration to an otherwise boring room. The shelves are made of MDF and wrapped in a walnut color that's very close to ikea walnut; not winning any design awards but not hideous either - it'll go with most decor. Overall a good set of decorative shelves for someone on a budget and looking for something easy to install.

reviews.title: Don't bother wasting your money on this
reviews.review_text: Cheap quality, poorly made and I would NOT trust it to hold anything. Not even something small and light. Hardware on back is not made correctly and uneven. The anchors are a joke, so unless you have better. My husband who is very handy and had worked on far more complicated projects said this was by far the worst. Retuning!

reviews.title: Great for decor
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The clean, minimalist design perfectly complements my modern decor. The white finish is crisp and brightens the room, making it feel more spacious. They blend seamlessly with any color palette, allowing for versatile styling. Very durable!

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Easy to install, looks great , very much intentional rustic. They are obviously very light weight and cannot handle much weight, and I would guess that the material scratches quite easily. They look fantastic for the price!

reviews.title: Floating shelf
reviews.review_text: When i first bought this I thought it would be an easy thing to do. After readying the reviews I decided to approach this with caution. The molly anchors that come with it, will not hold. I highly suggest to either screw the screws in the direct wall stub or use drywall anchors. Which is what I used, see photo. Follow instructions to put the drywall anchors from the package not the shelf box. After you screw in the screws it takes patience to fit the shelf in the screw and then slide it over to lock it. Above all be patient, it will work correctly. I highly recommend in buying this.

reviews.title: Love these shelves
reviews.review_text: I love these shelves they are exactly what i was looking for. I eanted to put these over the sink in my laundry room. My decor is modern farmhouse and these shelves are really anything you want them to be decor wise. The finish i have is natural with a beautiful grain finish. They are light which is great beacuse it will not add more weight to the shelves and more stress weight on the screws. These are floating so you do not see any brackets and it comes with all harware and instructions. I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.title: Nice touch to home decor!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Perfect for decorations or even picture frames! I love them! They seem sturdy and were easily put up! Thinking of buying another set to put some picture frames. Adds a nice little touch to your home decor.

reviews.title: shelves
reviews.review_text: i got these as a substitute item and was worried but they seem to be very steard and even hold up a 32 inch roku tv with ease

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.review_text: Came with two screws for two shelves that needed FOUR. Don't know if I was the only one who had this problem.

reviews.title: Pretty, needed support underneath to stabilize
reviews.review_text: Love the look but, had to add a support underneath the shelf to stabilize it. Otherwise it tilted downward.

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.review_text: This was exactly what I was, hoping it would be. Beautiful color, easy to install, and the perfect length and depth!

reviews.title: Bad installation design
reviews.review_text: The shelf is hung by 2 screws and it just doesn’t hang right and can pretty easily fall off the wall.

reviews.title: not as strong as I thought
reviews.review_text: mounting not very strong. bought for monitor studio speakers, they will not take much weight. advice, look before you buy these.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: These shelves are beautiful, sturdy and at a great price. It fits perfectly above my toilet and matches my new vanity from Home Depot.
These shelves are junk. I guess I shouldn't expect much for $10 shelves but they are awful and do not stay on the wall.

reviews.title: Great Floating Shelves!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great sturdy shelves for your light items. Used these to put up some giant frames on the top shelf of our home. Looks classy depending on your wall color. Thank you Influenster for the shelves!

reviews.title: Sleek and strong
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These shelves are a great option. Strong and will hold up. All the bits are in the package for a quick installation. The design is sleek, white shelves.

reviews.title: Super easy to Bulid!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love love these shelves! They're so easy to install, the quality of the shelves is spectacular! They look so cute once they're up, and they hold up a decent amount of stuff! Definitely a must have!

reviews.title: Very durable
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These shelves are very sturdy and durable. The quality is very good. They can hold quite a bit of stuff. The design is very elegant and modern. Installation is very easy too.

reviews.title: You need a scream drill to be installed
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shelf has a nice white color. The wooden material is very sturdy to hold. The surface is quite large and can hold many decorative items. Nails are included for easy installation.

reviews.title: Clean and Supportive Shelf
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Shelves work well. Easy mounting, and supportive. Seems like it can handle anything you'd put on it. Shelf is a little shallow, but that's not much of a problem.

reviews.title: Sleek and pretty
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] They are really pretty and sturdy and durable. They are not that large storage wise but the quality seems nice. The installation was not too difficult

reviews.title: Durable
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Installation of these shelves was easy. It gave me a little more storage space and even looked decorative. The product looks and feels durable so I think it will last for years.

reviews.title: Simple and clean
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Was super excited when I got these shelves. My husband has been dying to make a pop room to display all his funko pops and he finally has it. We had been thinking of ideas on what to use to display them but couldn't decide so after receiving the shelves we tried it out, loved it and immediately bought more. They were super easy to install and were very sturdy and even though my husband wanted to display them there is definitely enough room to do 2 rows.

reviews.title: Great price
reviews.review_text: I haven’t had a chance to put these up but the price is great

reviews.title: Love these
reviews.review_text: Going to paint these. They are super cute and durable!

reviews.title: Don’t recommend
reviews.review_text: They are hard to hang I gave up and now stuck with them
They will not hang because the installed hardware keyhole is crooked.
These were extremely difficult to put up and continued to fall down. Ended up throwing them away.

reviews.title: Perfect Affordable Shelves
reviews.review_text: Perfect shelves! I love the natural color. I used it to put my daughters Toni’s on!

reviews.title: i little hard to installation but still good
reviews.review_text: nice color overall nice just a little hard to install
The actors that come with do not work whatsoever. Spent hours trying to put this up, following the directions exactly and they won't stay up.

reviews.title: Don’t buy
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure what other people have done that I have not, but these do not stay flush to the wall the a loose appear to partially fall off the wall. I bought other floating shelves before and all I can say is that there are better options
Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to use great to look at

reviews.title: Cheaper isn't better
reviews.review_text: Poor quality, mounting hardware is so crooked that installation was not possible

reviews.title: do not buy
reviews.review_text: absolute garage product! cheap particel board, once mounted it still sagged. Even after tightening up the screws a few turns at a time. not worth buying!

reviews.title: Does not include everything needed to hang it
reviews.review_text: Did not come with hardware for hanging or instructions even though it says it does. Yes, it came with the built-in bracket, but it did not have the anchors or screws for hanging it. It requires a flat head screw (not typically sold with dry wall anchors) and I needed Drywall anchors. I had Drywall anchors but I didn't have any flat head screws so I had to go buy them separately. Disappointing to say the least.

reviews.title: Great shelf for a small space
reviews.review_text: The shelves are very attractive and a great value! The only negative comment I could make is, when you attach the shelf to the wall, it doesn't sit close enough to the wall so it kind of hangs down a little in the front. It's not enough to notice that much but you can't set anything heavy on it. Otherwise, love it!

reviews.title: Not sturdy…
reviews.review_text: These shelves are crap. The mounting hardware that they come with does not work with the shelves. Don’t waste your time or money.
Didn't come with mounting hardware, having a hard time finding something to fit the specific bracket on the back.
